intro.heading: Get Your Personalized Quote
intro.subHeading1: Fill out our detailed form to receive a custom proposal tailored to your specific needs.
intro.subHeading2: We'll review your requirements and send you a detailed quote within 24-48 hours.

step1.title: Package Selection
step1.description: Please confirm your package selection and provide some basic information about your business.

selectedPackage.label: Selected Package
selectedPackage.description: Confirm or change your selected package

selectedTier.label: Selected Tier
selectedTier.description: Confirm or change your selected tier

step2.title: Business Context & Goals
step2.description: Help us understand your current situation and what you're trying to achieve.

currentSituation.label: Current Business Situation
currentSituation.description: Briefly describe your current online presence and marketing efforts
currentSituation.placeholder: e.g., We have a basic website but no social media presence, or we're launching a new product...

primaryGoals.label: Primary Goals
primaryGoals.description: What are you hoping to achieve? (Select all that apply)

timeline.label: Project Timeline
timeline.description: When do you need this project completed?

step3.title: Package-Specific Requirements
step3.description: Based on your {package} package selection, please provide additional details:

existingBranding.label: Existing Branding
existingBranding.description: Do you have existing branding materials (logo, colors, fonts)?

websiteComplexity.label: Website Complexity
websiteComplexity.description: What type of website do you need?

contentCreationNeeds.label: Content Creation Needs
contentCreationNeeds.description: What content do you need us to create?

currentWebsiteTraffic.label: Current Website Traffic
currentWebsiteTraffic.description: Approximately how many visitors per month do you currently get?

targetAudience.label: Target Audience
targetAudience.placeholder: e.g., Small business owners aged 30-50, or B2B decision makers

geographicTargeting.label: Geographic Targeting
geographicTargeting.description: Where do you want to reach customers?

preferredAdPlatforms.label: Preferred Advertising Platforms
preferredAdPlatforms.description: Which platforms are you most interested in?

currentSeoPerformance.label: Current SEO Performance
currentSeoPerformance.description: How is your website currently performing in search results?
currentSeoPerformance.placeholder: e.g., Page 2 for main keywords, or 'Not sure about current ranking'

existingCampaigns.label: Existing Marketing Campaigns
existingCampaigns.description: Do you have ongoing marketing campaigns?

maintenanceFrequency.label: Preferred Maintenance Frequency
maintenanceFrequency.description: How often would you like us to review and optimize?

priorityAreas.label: Priority Areas
priorityAreas.description: Which areas need the most attention?

step4.title: Budget & Project Details
step4.description: Help us understand your budget expectations and project requirements.

budgetRange.label: Budget Range
budgetRange.description: What is your expected budget for this project? (This helps us provide the most accurate quote)

additionalServices.label: Additional Services
additionalServices.description: Are you interested in any additional services? (Optional)

startDate.label: Preferred Start Date
startDate.description: When would you like to start this project?

expectation.title: What happens next?
expectation.description: After submitting this form, our team will review your requirements and prepare a detailed proposal. You'll receive your personalized quote within 24-48 hours via email.

additionalInfo.label: Additional Information (Optional)
additionalInfo.placeholder: Any additional details, special requirements, or questions you'd like us to know about...

newsletter.label: I would like to receive marketing updates and tips via email

multiStepForm.submitError: There was an error submitting your request. Please try again.
